data.eml:eml: A review of the Pseudomyrmex ferrugineus and Pseudomyrmex goeldii species groups: acacia-ants and relatives (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ward, Philip S. (2017): A review of the Pseudomyrmex ferrugineus and Pseudomyrmex goeldii species groups: acacia-ants and relatives (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 4227 (4): 524-542, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.4.3
